vsParam:
Wah ah ah ah!?
Who threw a board eraser at my head!?

Darn it, who did this!
My books are all messed up!

Hmm, there are lots of pranks going on in the campus, which
have severely compromised the discipline of the Academy...

Really? Is it this serious?
But I think that's what a campus life should be...

No, no way! Improper behaviors suggest tainted morality!
Even the pettiest pranks can't be left unpunished!
I'll find the criminal and punish him or her... Ah.

... Uh, Sue.
Why are you holding an ice cube?

Hmm, uh... Ha-ha...
I, I wasn't going to put it into Cresson's collar...
Criminal of the pranks... There you go.

What are you doing! It was you!
How can you do all these pranks, Sue!!

Hmm! I, I am so bored!
They said there are monsters outside and wouldn't let me out!

And, the Academy is so big and has so many people.
Doing pranks here is very interesting!

Ha-ha... Look how happy she is...
Sue really does like pranks...

I mean, Sue, it's not like I can't understand your feeling,
but you shouldn't play tricks on other people just because
you feel bored...

Oh, I just found my target!
Hehehe♪
Are you even listening to me at all!

Ha-ha... It's not strange for a kid of
her age to like pranks...

Yeah... Ah! W, wait!
You don't want to play tricks with that person...

Ah, ah wah wah wah...
Why would she pick Bergamot Sensei!?

Hehehehe...
Playing tricks on a sensei, you are really daring, Sue?

Hehe, come. Let's have a private discussion about this.
Don't think I'll let you slide...

Hmm——!? I, I am so sorry!
I won't... do that again, please forgive me...

Ah, hmm... She's taken away...
Looks like she's not coming back any time soon...

Ha-ha... I am sure she doesn't want to make pranks
anymore after this...

Yeah... Although she's a bit pathetic,
she did asked for it. Stay brave, Sue...

No ah ah ah ah ah!
I was wrong, I am sorry~~~~~!!!
